languages.text: {n}Сервиторы как по команде перестают двигаться, опускают руки — и поворачиваются к вам.{/n} "Бригада 24, вторая аллея {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}мануфакторума{/g}. Приступаем к работе. Озвучьте запрос". {n}Взгляд обратившегося к вам сервитора направлен мимо вас, а голос доносится из вмонтированного в горло {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокса{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Сервиторы как по команде перестают двигаться, опускают руки — и поворачиваются к вам.{/n} "Бригада 24, периметр Дзета-86. Приступаем к работе. Введите запрос". {n}Взгляд обратившегося к вам сервитора направлен мимо вас, а голос доносится из вмонтированного в горло вокса.{/n}

languages.text: {n}As if on cue, the servitors stop moving, lower their arms, and turn to you.{/n} "Crew 24, second lane of the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}. Commencing work. State your request." {n}The servitor addressing you is looking past you, and the voice is coming from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into its throat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сервиторы как по команде перестают двигаться, опускают руки — и поворачиваются к вам.{/n} "Бригада 24, вторая аллея {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}мануфакторума{/g}. Приступаем к работе. Озвучьте запрос". {n}Взгляд обратившегося к вам сервитора направлен мимо вас, а голос доносится из вмонтированного в горло {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокса{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}As if on cue, the Servitors stop moving, lower their hands, and turn to you.{/n} "Crew 24, second lane of the Manufactorum. Commencing work. Please voice your request." {n}The Servitor addressing you is looking past you, and the voice is coming out of the vox built into its throat.{/n}

Please voice your request." {n}The servitor addressing you is looking past you, and the voice is coming out of the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into its throat.{/n}

State your request." {n}The servitor addressing you is looking past you, and the voice is coming from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into its throat.{/n}

{n}As if on cue, the servitors stop moving, lower their arms, and turn to you.{/n} "Crew 24, second lane of the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}. Commencing work. State your request." {n}The servitor addressing you is looking past you, and the voice is coming from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into its throat.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这些机仆不约而同地停下了动作，放下手臂，转向了你。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}制造工厂{/g}第二列，第24组，即将准备工作。请说明你的要求。”{n}对你说话的机仆视线越过了你，它的声音是从喉咙中内置的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}装置中发出来的。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As if on cue, the servitors stop moving, lower their arms, and turn to you.{/n} "Crew 24, second lane of the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}. Commencing work. State your request." {n}The servitor addressing you is looking past you, and the voice is coming from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into its throat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这些奴工不约而同地停下了动作，放下手臂，转向了你。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}制造工厂{/g}第二列，第24组，即将准备工作。请说明你的要求。”{n}对你说话的奴工视线越过了你，它的声音是从喉咙中内置的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}装置中发出来的。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Como si alguien se lo hubiera ordenado, los servidores dejan de moverse, bajan los brazos y se giran hacia ti.{/n} «Equipo 24, segundo carril del {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}. Iniciando trabajo. Presente su solicitud». {n}El servidor que se dirige a ti parece mirar lo que tienes detrás. La voz viene del {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} que tiene instalado en la garganta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As if on cue, the servitors stop moving, lower their arms, and turn to you.{/n} "Crew 24, second lane of the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}. Commencing work. State your request." {n}The servitor addressing you is looking past you, and the voice is coming from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into its throat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Como si alguien se lo hubiera ordenado, los servidores dejan de moverse, bajan los brazos y se giran hacia ti.{/n} «Equipo 24, segundo carril del {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}. Iniciando trabajo. Presente su solicitud». {n}El servidor que se dirige a ti parece mirar lo que tienes detrás. La voz viene del {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} que tiene instalado en la garganta.{/n}

languages.text: {n}まるで合図でも出されたかのように、サーヴィター達は動きを止め、腕を下げてこちらを向く。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}聖工場{/g}2番レーン、クルー24番。作業を開始します。どうぞご命令を」{n}こちらに話しかけるサーヴィターの目は部屋の奥を見つめており、その声は喉に組み込まれた{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}から発せられていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As if on cue, the servitors stop moving, lower their arms, and turn to you.{/n} "Crew 24, second lane of the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}. Commencing work. State your request." {n}The servitor addressing you is looking past you, and the voice is coming from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into its throat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}まるで合図でも出されたかのように、サーヴィター達は動きを止め、腕を下げてこちらを向く。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}聖工場{/g}2番レーン、クルー24番。作業を開始します。どうぞご命令を」{n}こちらに話しかけるサーヴィターの目は部屋の奥を見つめており、その声は喉に組み込まれた{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}から発せられていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Wie auf Befehl stellen die Servitoren jede Bewegung ein, senken die Arme und wenden sich dir zu.{/n} "Crew 24, zweites Fließband des {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}Manufactorums{/g}. Beginnen mit der Arbeit. Wie lautet Eure Anweisung?" {n}Der Servitor, der dich angesprochen hat, sieht an dir vorbei, und seine Stimme kommt aus dem {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g} in seiner Kehle.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As if on cue, the servitors stop moving, lower their arms, and turn to you.{/n} "Crew 24, second lane of the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}. Commencing work. State your request." {n}The servitor addressing you is looking past you, and the voice is coming from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into its throat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Wie auf Befehl stellen die Servitoren jede Bewegung ein, senken die Arme und wenden sich dir zu.{/n} "Crew 24, zweites Fließband des {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}Manufactorums{/g}. Beginnen mit der Arbeit. Wie lautet Eure Anweisung?" {n}Der Servitor, der dich angesprochen hat, sieht an dir vorbei, und seine Stimme kommt aus dem {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g} in seiner Kehle.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les servitors s'immobilisent soudainement, baissent les bras et se tournent vous vous.{/n} « Équipe 24, deuxième ligne du {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}. Début du travail. Formulez votre demande. » {n}Le servitor s'adresse à vous sans croiser votre regard et sa voix sort du {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} intégré à sa gorge.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As if on cue, the servitors stop moving, lower their arms, and turn to you.{/n} "Crew 24, second lane of the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}. Commencing work. State your request." {n}The servitor addressing you is looking past you, and the voice is coming from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into its throat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les servitors s'immobilisent soudainement, baissent les bras et se tournent vous vous.{/n} « Équipe 24, deuxième ligne du {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}. Début du travail. Formulez votre demande. » {n}Le servitor s'adresse à vous sans croiser votre regard et sa voix sort du {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} intégré à sa gorge.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İşaret verilmiş gibi diğer hizmetörler de hareket etmeyi bırakıyor, kollarını indirip sana dönüyor.{/n} "24. Ekip, {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufaktorumun{/g} ikinci şeridi. İşe başlanıyor. İsteğinizi belirtin." {n}Hizmetör sana hitap etse de gözüne bakmıyor, ses ise boğazına yerleştirilmiş {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vokstan{/g} geliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As if on cue, the servitors stop moving, lower their arms, and turn to you.{/n} "Crew 24, second lane of the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}. Commencing work. State your request." {n}The servitor addressing you is looking past you, and the voice is coming from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into its throat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İşaret verilmiş gibi diğer servitörler de hareket etmeyi bırakıyor, kollarını indiriyor ve sana dönüyor.{/n} "24. Ekip, {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufaktorum{/g}un ikinci şeridi. İşe başlanıyor. İsteğinizi belirtin." {n}Servitör sana hitap etse de gözüne bakmıyor, ses ise boğazına yerleştirilmiş {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g}tan geliyor.{/n}
